channel.title: AI Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content on AI Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: InternLM-XComposer2.5-OmniLive: A Comprehensive Multimodal System for Long-term Streaming Video and Audio Interactions
item.description: InternLM-XComposer2.5-OmniLive: 실시간 스트리밍 비디오 및 오디오 상호작용을 위한 인간의 인지능력을 모방한 혁신적 다중 모드 AI 시스템

item.title: About This Project
item.description:
Welcome to AI Paper Reviewer!

AI Paper Reviewer is a unique platform dedicated to providing insightful reviews and summaries of artificial intelligence research papers. The content is entirely generated by advanced AI systems, offering a novel approach to understanding and disseminating complex scientific literature.

item.title: NeuZip: Memory-Efficient Training and Inference with Dynamic Compression of Neural Networks
item.description: NeuZip dynamically compresses neural network weights, achieving memory-efficient training and inference without performance loss, significantly reducing the memory footprint of large language models.

item.title: Background-aware Moment Detection for Video Moment Retrieval
item.description: BM-DETR: 배경 정보 활용으로 비디오 순간 검색의 약한 정렬 문제 해결!
